properties.name: spring.cloud.inetutils.default-hostname
properties.description: The default hostname. Used in case of errors.

properties.name: spring.cloud.inetutils.default-ip-address
properties.description: The default IP address. Used in case of errors.

properties.name: spring.cloud.inetutils.ignored-interfaces
properties.description: List of Java regular expressions for network interfaces that will be ignored.

properties.name: spring.cloud.inetutils.preferred-networks
properties.description: List of Java regular expressions for network addresses that will be preferred.

properties.name: spring.cloud.inetutils.timeout-seconds
properties.description: Timeout, in seconds, for calculating hostname.

properties.name: spring.cloud.inetutils.use-only-site-local-interfaces
properties.description: Whether to use only interfaces with site local addresses. See {@link InetAddress#isSiteLocalAddress()} for more details.
